#summary Description of the RDF Plugin

= Introduction =

The purpose of the RDF Plugin is to allow you to create, store and query RDF triples in a jQuery-like way. There are several objects within the RDF Plugin:

  * [#Literal jQuery.rdf.literal] for literal values
  * [#Blank jQuery.rdf.blank] for blank values
  * [#Resource jQuery.rdf.resource] for resources
  * [#Triple jQuery.rdf.triple] for triples
  * [#RDF jQuery.rdf] for utility methods
